definition: any undertaking that is easy to do, to proceed quickly and easily
details:
noun
- any undertaking that is easy to do
= synonyms: snap
- a slight wind (usually refreshing)
= example: a slight wind (usually refreshing)
= synonyms: air
verb
- to proceed quickly and easily
= example: to proceed quickly and easily
- to blow gently and lightly
= example: to blow gently and lightly
